metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3297 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
use-after-free in user.c

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3297` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

accountsservice - 22.08.8-1ubuntu1.1
gir1.2-accountsservice-1.0 - 22.08.8-1ubuntu1.1
libaccountsservice0 - 22.08.8-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is GHSL-2023-139 Issue is in the Ubuntu-specific 0010-set-language.patch patch.

criterions.comment: accountsservice package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.08.8-1ubuntu1.1').
